ValidationRule.description: If the FundingShield Status field is vetted, the FundingShield Last Vetted Date cannot be blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( FundingShield_Last_Vetted_Date__c ), ISPICKVAL(FundingShield_Status__c , "Vetted with expiration") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account requires FundingShield Last Vetted Date since the FundingShield Status is Vetted with Expiration.
